attributes.action: "All Sports that represent Britain should be shown on National Television not Sky,like Boxing,Cricket etc.".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that all sports that represent Britain should be shown on National Television not Sky,like Boxing,Cricket etc.".If Ricky Hatton is fighting then it should be shown on National Television where ever the fight is as he is representing Great Britain.The Ashes (Cricket) again which was only available on Sky Live.Our cricketers are representing Great Britain so games should be made available on National Television for the Nation to enjoy not the just the people that can afford Sky T.V.The Nation wants to watch our sports men and women LIVE,not just the highlights.
